word: The abiding rest--who has it? That rest is found when all self-justification, all reasoning from a selfish standpoint, is put away. Entire self-surrender, an acceptance of His ways, is the secret of perfect rest in His love. We must learn His meekness and lowliness before we experience the fulfillment of the promise "Ye shall find rest unto your souls" (Matthew 11:29). It is by learning the habits of Christ that self becomes transformed--by taking His yoke, and then submitting to learn.
